#include <vector> 
#include <list> 
#include <map> 
#include <set> 
#include <deque> 
#include <queue> 
#include <stack> 
#include <bitset> 
#include <algorithm> 
#include <functional> 
#include <numeric> 
#include <utility> 
#include <sstream> 
#include <iostream> 
#include <iomanip> 
#include <cstdio> 
#include <cmath> 
#include <cstdlib> 
#include <cctype> 
#include <string> 
#include <cstring> 
#include <cstdio> 
#include <cmath> 
#include <cstdlib> 
#include <ctime> 
 
using namespace std; 
 
int main () {
  int n, N, d;
  string s;
  cin >> s;
  while (s != "#") {
    N = atoi (s.c_str ());
    d = 0;
    for (n = 1; n <= N; n++) {
      if (n == 1) d++;
      else if (n == 2) d += 4;
      else if (n == 3) d += 9;
      else {
	switch (n % 10) {
	case 1:case 3:case 7:case 9:
	  d++; break;
	case 2:case 4:case 6:case 8:
	  d += 6; break;
	case 5:
	  d += 5; break;
	case 10:
	  break;
	}
      }
    }
    cout << d % 10 << endl;
    cin >> s;
  }
  return 0;
}
